name: THE TREACHERY OF POETRY (After Magritte But Not Whitman)
description: This is not a poem — or rather, this is not a line of poetry by Walt Whitman, as attributed, but an excerpt from a text generated by a natural language processing AI based on a prompt written by Sasha Stiles. This digital collage is from #UpdateYourArt, an ongoing series by @sashastiles that updates iconic masterpieces for the posthuman era, and is an homage to Magritte’s “The Treachery of Images,” also known as “This is Not a Pipe” or “The Wind and the Song.” www.sashastiles.com
